Job Title: HVAC Steamfitter Apprentice

Location: Milwaukee, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Build your best future with the Johnson Controls Team 

As a global leader in smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, our mission is to reimagine the performance of buildings to serve people, places and the planet. Join a winning team that enables you to build your best future! Become a member of the Johnson Controls family and thrive in an empowering company culture where your voice and ideas will be heard â€“ your next great opportunity is just a few clicks away!

What You Will Do

The HVAC Project Apprentice will work with the project team on the installation and service of various types of HVAC equipment. The position comes with a company gas card and company truck which will be issued once the employee completes the 90 day probational period. Johnson Controls takes pride and looks forward to training apprentices to become competent, highly skilled journeypersons for our company and in the workforce.

How You Will Do It

Installation of chillers cooling towers, pumps, air-cooled chillers, boilers, piping, ductwork, rooftop units, split-systems, and more The project apprentice will be trained on Johnson Controls safety culture and be supervised to be sure they are working safely and efficiently and following all safety rules JCI requires Following Johnson Controls safety protocols and wearing PPE when on-site 

Requirements

What we look for

1 year experience working on mechanical systemsMust have a letter of introduction from Union Local 601Basic technology and computer skills Positive attitude and ability to work well with others Must be involved in a 5-year local union apprenticeship program
